objectives.--obj-custom-description: We create unique websites tailored to your brand's needs.
objectives.--obj-SEO-description: Increase your search engine visibility with our integrated strategies.
objectives.--obj-responsive-description: We build websites with a flawless user experience on any device.
objectives.--obj-fast-description: Fast and efficient websites to boost performance.
objectives.--obj-secure-description: We protect your site against vulnerabilities and threats.
objectives.--obj-support-description: We support your web project with maintenance and updates.

payCards.--paycard-textForContact: Hello, I'd like to inquire about the web maintenance plan
payCards.--paycard-description: Content updates, error fixes, and regular technical support for your website.

payCards.--paycard-textForContact: Hello, I'd like to inquire about the landing page plan
payCards.--paycard-description: Designed for those looking to stand out online with a fast, effective and profitable page.

payCards.--paycard-textForContact: Hello, I'd like to inquire about the premium plan
payCards.--paycard-description: Creation of completely customized multi-page websites optimized for your needs.

payCards.--paycard-textForContact: Hello, I'd like to inquire about the API Development/Integration plan
payCards.--paycard-description: Creation or connection with third-party APIs to integrate advanced functionalities into your project.

payCards.--paycard-textForContact: Hello, I'd like to inquire about the online store plan
payCards.--paycard-description: Professional and optimized online stores using WordPress and WooCommerce to manage your online business.

characteristics.text: Optimized shopping cart and checkout process

payCards.--paycard-title: Websites for Tattoo Artists Who Want to Stand Out
payCards.--paycard-textForContact: Hello, I'd like a website for my tattoo studio
payCards.--paycard-description: Showcase your art, get more clients and manage bookings stress-free.

characteristics.text: Professional gallery to display your tattoos
Free hosting and domain for first year
Online store to sell merch and products

footer.--footer-aboutText: We are a creative team inspired to design websites with style and personality. We research the latest trends but always add our unique touch. We create digital spaces that help brands connect with their customers, combining creativity, innovation, and our own essence.
